May 8, 1994 D Weston-super-Mare (Third Section)
Weston-super-Mare (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Weston-super-Mare Contest weston-super-mare-third-section
Winter Gardens, Weston-super-Mare, Somerset, England, UK Best instrumentalist - euphonium of Hyde. Prizes - 1st £100, 2nd £60, 3rd £45. 9 bands competed.
March 9, 2015, 12:59 p.m. July 7, 2020, 10:16 a.m.

2 Glastonbury Brass Ray Hunt
3 Cross Keys Silver Band A. J. Harris
